!Head Summoner Radyss: Young leaf, I've been waiting for you! In your absence, I've examined several things. Yes, I found the fifth Stone of Commune. However, unfortunately, it lost its power. This is the Stone of Commune you sensed. But can't you tell that its power is weaker than before?%% Hack... Fortunately, I've learned that there are more Stones of Commune that are just like this one. One can be found at the Imperial Tomb and the other can be found at the Wall of Argos. Hack... At the cemetery, look in the* Four Sepulchers*. If you decide to go to the Wall of Argos, look in the* Shrine of the Loyal* in the northeastern part of the valley. And...
